entry.title: Welcome to my new site!
entry.content:
This is my first post on this GitHub Pages + Jekyll site.
I’ll be documenting my work here.
entry.summary: This is my first post on this GitHub Pages + Jekyll site. I’ll be documenting my work here.

entry.title: My Great Post Title
entry.content:
Introduction

Write your opening thoughts here.
Markdown works perfectly.

Main Content

You can structure however you like:

  • Bullet points
  • Code blocks
  • Math
  • Quotes

Code example

print("hello world")
